title: Himi 439
lyrics:
8.7.8.7.6.8.6.8.
1.
‘Oku ai ha kātoanga
Kuo teu ‘e he ‘Otua,
Maʻa e kāinga masiva
‘I he tukui fonua.
Haʻu, ‘o hū,
‘Oku ‘atā ‘a Hēvani.
2.
Na’a ne fua tuku atu
‘Ene kau talafekau
Ki he Siū mo e Senitaile
‘I he ngaahi fonua hau,
“Ha’u, ‘o hū,
‘Oku ‘atā ‘a Hēvani.”
3.
Senitaile naʻa ne kata,
‘Alu ‘ene fakatau;
Pea ko Siū ne ta’etokanga,
‘O paetaku he fekau-
“Haʻu, ‘o hū,
‘Oku ‘atā ‘a Hēvani.”
4.
Houhau ai ‘a e Finangalo,
‘O ne folofola mai,
“Alu ‘o fakahā mamaʻo,
Tala tavale ki māman
i
,
Haʻu , ‘o hū,
‘Oku ‘atā ‘a Hēvani.”
5.
“Tala ki Fisi kai tangata;
Tala ki Tonga pole tau;
ʻOku ngofua ‘a e kātoanga,
Ki he kakai ‘e fie ha’u.
Haʻu, ‘o hū,
‘Oku ‘atā ‘a Hēvani.”
6.
“Tala ke ha’u pē ‘a e motu’a
Tala ke haʻu ‘a e tamasi’i;
Tala ke ha’u pē ‘a e fonua
Tala ke haʻu ‘a e fāmili
Ha’u, ‘o hū,
‘Oku ‘atā ‘a Hēvani.”
7.
‘Oku laui miliona
Si’i kainga kuo ‘i ai
Ka ‘oku kei fanongonongoa,
He ‘oku lahi ‘a Hēvani.
Haʻu, ‘o hū,
‘Oku atā ‘a Hēvani. *
